text:
On 12/22/2024 at 02:51 PM, Christine Moyer wrote:
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/23/2024 at 08:21 AM)
Subject:Fidelity - MSFT Dividend transfer
A dividend for msft stock was posted to the Fidelity account on Dec 22 in amount of 2,892.
Per agreement, my 52% portion (equal 1,504) should be transferred within 10 days. Could you send that over?
If you are still in disagreement if 50 versus 52%, at minimum you can transfer the 50% of 1,446 until you confirm with Lisa.
Thank you.
Message 261 of 287
I thought we talked on the 19th.
Sent:12/28/2024 at 08:56 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/28/2024 at 08:57 AM)
Subject:Re: Fidelity - MSFT Dividend transfer
On 12/28/2024 at 08:46 AM, Christine Moyer wrote:
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 12/28/2024 at 08:47 AM)
Subject:Re: Fidelity - MSFT Dividend transfer
OFW is mode of communication between you and I as I understand.
On 12/27/2024 at 07:10 PM, Robert Moyer wrote:
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/28/2024 at 08:45 AM)
Subject:Re: Fidelity - MSFT Dividend transfer
So I have raised an issue with the effectiveness of our communications since we canâ€™t keep Fidelity, BofA, various school, therapy, or
compliance folks always on the thread for personal stuff. You did not respond.
Should I assume that moving forward we just go through lawyers from now on? My hope from the discussion on the 19th was we would begin
to work together a little more cooperatively. Let me know.
On 12/26/2024 at 02:09 PM, Robert Moyer wrote:
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 12/27/2024 at 03:30 PM)
Subject:Re: Fidelity - MSFT Dividend transfer
So I sent the email confirmations from the origin intuitions earlier trying to show what I had done. Then this landed. Going back and forth
across platforms is very hard and will always be fraught with delays and mistakes. And we can't move Fidelity or BofA to OFW.
I will rarely get this right across platforms, accounts, credits, debits,, etc.. I am just letting you know in the most constructive way possible, that
this is super frustrating, hard to track and will always increase unnecessary friction between you and I till Adrian is 18 years old.
